svt_axi_port_monitor_system_checker_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_port_monitor_system_checker_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The svt_axi_port_monitor_system_checker_callback class is extended from the svt_axi_port_monitor_callback class in order to put transactions into a fifo that connects to the system level checker
